publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6706 Jackie Baillie: Congratulations to Mrs Larking—That the Parliament congratulates Mrs Alison Larking on her retirement after almost 44 years’ service at Levenvale Primary School; understands that she attended the school as a pupil before returning, initially as a student teacher; further understands that she intends to continue to volunteer at the school even after she retires; commends her for her years of dedication to generations of children, and wishes Mrs Larking a long and happy retirement.
S3M-6706 Congratulations to Mrs Larking (lodged on 2 July 2010) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-6706 Congratulations to Mrs Larking (lodged on 2 July 2010) Trish Godman*
